original_text: And the seven years of dearth began to come, according as Joseph had said: and the dearth was in all lands; but in all the land of Egypt there was bread.
korean_text: 요셉의 말과 같이 일곱 해 흉년이 들기 시작하매 각국에는 기근이 있으나 애굽 온 땅에는 먹을 것이 있더니

sentences.original_text: And the seven years of dearth began to come
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 일곱 해의 흉년이 오기 시작했으며

sentences.original_text: and the dearth was in all lands
but in all the land of Egypt
